sections.heading: Overview
content:
Lori Beth Stargrove, ND, practices at A Wellspring of Natural
Health , where she specializes in pediatrics and women's health. Her tools
include lifestyle counseling, nutrition, homeopathy, herbs, metabolic
therapies, and a unique style of supporting a person's healing process.
